EmailTemplate.subject: 4/11/19 Webinar - 6 Things You Need to Know to Safely Run Kubernetes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join us for the webinar 6 Things You Need to Know to Safely Run Kubernetes <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-11-6-things-you-need-to-know-to-safely-run-kubernetes-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=6-thing-kubernetes&utm_term=q119]]>, on April 11, 2019.
Kubernetes has exploded in popularity among developers. But as operations teams prepare to support Kubernetes in production, they have more considerations—namely, how to operate a stable platform while maintaining security and compliance. How Kubernetes is configured and deployed has a marked impact on these attributes.
Attend this session with Author and Pivotal Vice President of Technology, Cornelia Davis, to learn the following:
- How to isolate tenants in your Kubernetes environment.
- How to make upgrading Kubernetes clusters boring.
- What you should—and shouldn’t—let your developers do.
- What you need around your Kubernetes clusters to keep them safe.
- How using Pivotal Container Service (PKS) helps run Kubernetes.
Presenters: Cornelia Davis, Author and Pivotal Vice President of Technology
Date: Thursday, April 11, 2019 Time: 10:00am PDT / 1:00pm EDT
Attend <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/apr-11-6-things-you-need-to-know-to-safely-run-kubernetes-webinar?utm_source=promo&utm_medium=webinar&utm_campaign=6-thing-kubernetes&utm_term=q119]]>
We thank you in advance for joining us. The Pivotal Team
